com.otb.utility.utils

Class SharedPreferenceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.otb.utility.utils.SharedPreferenceUtils

  • public class SharedPreferenceUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Mohit Rajput on 6/7/17. This class creates and manages preferences for this application. It can be used in singleton pattern

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SharedPreferenceUtils getInstance(android.content.Context context)
        It returns singleton object of @SharedPreferenceUtils class. The best practice is to create its instance once in your Application class and use it everywhere so that you don't need to pass context again.
        Parameters:
        context -
        Returns:
        Instance of @SharedPreferenceUtils class
